excerpts: I was torn between the classic breakfast burrito and the breakfast sandwich.
So I got both, because why not?!?
But I have to say the breakfast sandwich was to die for.
The bun is out of this world.
Then the bacon jam and gooey cheddar cheese and bacon and fried egg.
the breakfast sandwich.author: SA M.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
This place is goood! If you love bacon come give it a try. There's some fun things on the menu. I was torn between the classic breakfast burrito and the breakfast sandwich. So I got both, because why not?!? But I have to say the breakfast sandwich was to die for. The bun is out of this world. Then the bacon jam and gooey cheddar cheese and bacon and fried egg. YUMMMM

DONT get me wrong, the breakfast burrito was good. But it was exactly as ordered a classic breakfast burrito. It was good. There's just something about that bacon jam and that bun on the sandwich. 

Oh and I got a Vietnamese iced coffee because I've been up since 4 AM, and I need a mid day/morning pick me up. 

There's a cute little mechanical pig you can ride. There's sweatshirts, hats and T-shirt's you can buy. And my food came out within 5 minutes. I highly recommend it!!!!

excerpts: I ordered the breakfast sandwich and my fiancé ordered the breakfast burrito (with pork).
the breakfast sandwich.author: Cecilia C.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Wanted something quick and delicious for breakfast so we stumbled across Bacon Bacon and followed the reviews!

I ordered the breakfast sandwich and my fiancé ordered the breakfast burrito (with pork). 

Our food came out incredibly fast - sandwich had their special bacon jam, which really looked like pulled pork, but wasn't anything too special to me, though it seems to be a hit with everyone else! I don't have a huge sweet tooth, so I'm sure I would have enjoyed this more if I was more of a sweets fan. 

I loved the gooey cheesiness of this sandwich and the bun is really a star! The bacon, of course, was great. 

The sandwich was delicious, but not the best breakfast sandwich I've ever had. I think the pricing is fair and though the sandwich may look small, it's the perfect amount of food. 

If you're a coffee fan, they have a pretty good Vietnamese coffee. I especially like the ice that comes in it. Almost slushy like. 

I'm definitely wanting to go back to try some more of their menu items. Bacon on everything is the way to go!

excerpts: We both ordered the breakfast sandwich, and I venture to say it's the best one I've ever had.

The bun is fluffy and soft but slightly crispy around the edges, the egg is perfectly gooey in the middle, the bacon is crispy and thick and delicious, and the bacon jam is the most perfect balance of salty and sweet.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Ashley M.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Bacon Bacon was so good that we went 2 days in a row. We both ordered the breakfast sandwich, and I venture to say it's the best one I've ever had. The bun is fluffy and soft but slightly crispy around the edges, the egg is perfectly gooey in the middle, the bacon is crispy and thick and delicious, and the bacon jam is the most perfect balance of salty and sweet. Dear God it was amazing. 

The first time we went, we got iced Vietnamese coffee- YUM!! Creamy and strong and slightly sweet. The next day we got iced Havana coffee and it was somehow better than the iced Vietnamese coffee. Omg. A hint of cinnamon, a tiny bit of chocolate. And omgggg so good. Thank God we don't live in SF or we'd eat there everyday. 

Service was quick and the staff was great. The guy gave us the coffee recommendations each day and they surely didn't disappoint. We'll definitely go back next time we're in town!!

excerpts: The one called the breakfast sandwich is delicious as well with bacon jam which is #tdf.
I will definitely return if I'm in town.
The view outside is phenomenal and the staff was friendly.
The bread was quite delectable and the cheese was ooey gooey goodness.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Ron B.
the breakfast sandwich.review: If you're in the neighborhood and looking for something to remind you of the bustling Manhattan street deli's then look no further. The New Yorker B.E.C is reminiscent of a classic bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich from the city that never sleeps. The one called the breakfast sandwich is delicious as well with bacon jam which is #tdf. I will definitely return if I'm in town. The view outside is phenomenal and the staff was friendly. The bread was quite delectable and the cheese was ooey gooey goodness.

excerpts: I ordered the breakfast sandwich.
The bacon jam was a major disappointment.
It's nothing like your usual jam but more like burnt pulled pork.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Tiffany B.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
I've been eyeing this place for quite some time. I consider myself a bacon aficionado and I was failed. You can easily miss this place but it's on Franklin off Ashbury.

FYI street sweeping is 8 to 10 on Tuesday or Friday depending on where you park. 

I ordered the breakfast sandwich. The bacon jam was a major disappointment. It's nothing like your usual jam but more like burnt pulled pork. I got about 3 slices of mediocre flavorless bacon.

For $9 I could've made 4 tasty sandwiches! At least I can say I tried it. But don't waste your time.

excerpts: I ordered the banh mi, while others in my party ordered the breakfast sandwich, cobb salad, bacon cheeseburger, and the cuban.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Nina V.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
I came here with family for a quick meal before exploring the city. The restaurant is quite small, with about 4 bar-height tables and a longer counter that can all seat about 20 people.

I ordered the banh mi, while others in my party ordered the breakfast sandwich, cobb salad, bacon cheeseburger, and the cuban.

As we sat down, we all noticed the crazy amount of flies around our table. After a few seconds of looking around the restaurant, we noticed there were flies EVERYWHERE. They're all over the walls, merchandise (sweater, mugs, etc.) that they sell, napkins, cups, water cooler, everywhere. This made me lose my appetite really quickly.

While my Banh Mi sandwich was good, I couldn't get over all of the flies. Additionally, the bacon was really overcooked - not crispy but rather really hard and inedible.

There are restrooms, but you literally have to go through the kitchen and up some stairs across an extremely greasy floor.

Overall, I'd say the food is good, but the restaurant really needs to put some effort into cleaning the place. I understand that cooking bacon all day and having grease spatter everywhere doesn't help, but I would think it's health hazard to have grease on the floors and allowing flies to breed here. Gross.

excerpts: I decided for research purposes only to try the breakfast sandwich   Love has been found :-).
the breakfast sandwich.author: Phil W.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Basic but artery filling good;-)

I  tried Swiss croissant which was disappointing as croissant was over cooked for my tastes. 

I decided for research purposes only to try the breakfast sandwich   Love has been found :-). 

The egg  oozes as you  you crunch into they bacon deliciousness.  





Yum yum

excerpts: The jam on the breakfast sandwich was the highlight.
The egg was runny and the bread was fluffy.
Wait time wasn't too long, but went on a Sunday morning and couldn't find seating.
8 dollars is a good price for a breakfast sandwich but it wasn't as filling as I would have hoped.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Bito M.
the breakfast sandwich.review: The jam on the breakfast sandwich was the highlight. The egg was runny and the bread was fluffy. Wait time wasn't too long, but went on a Sunday morning and couldn't find seating. 8 dollars is a good price for a breakfast sandwich but it wasn't as filling as I would have hoped. The classic breakfast burrito was a little bland and had very little avocado. Would recommend if you're nearby but I wouldn't go out of my way to get it

excerpts: While the menu has changed over the years, many of the classics are still there like the breakfast sandwich and breakfast burrito.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Erik H.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
There are lots of places that have caught on to the bacon craze, but there still is truth to going to a place that focuses on bacon to get the best of the best.

While the trucks still work as great advertisers to new people to the concept, this original location in the Haight still is my go to place although the owner, Jim, spends more time at his bigger 3rd street location.  

While the menu has changed over the years, many of the classics are still there like the breakfast sandwich and breakfast burrito.  The Banh Mi sandwich recently returned to the menu at this location as well.  

Many menu items have returned after the historic battle with anti-swine neighbors that resulted in a nice plug on SNL, but the casualty is the pork belly sandwich I figure just became too expensive.

This location gets packed in weekends while the other location is more for the working crowd so be prepared to grab a cup of coffee and wait.  Parking can be difficult as well, but it is all worth it right?

What did I have this time around?  We split the breakfast burrito and sandwich.  

Yes they will always have me at Bacon!!

excerpts: We ordered the Breakfast Sandwich and Breakfast Burrito to split, then the Porky Fries and Bacon Chili to save for later - yes we were feeling ambitious that day.
Our food seemed to take forever to prepare.
There is also not a lot of seating, so you might have to wait around for a bit and snatch a table when someone leaves.
The Breakfast Sandwich was my favorite out of all those choices.
The egg was messy but the flavor was perfect.
How could such a simple sandwich be so good?
Would recommend.
The other foods we got were also good.
Would not recommend saving any of these for later like I tried to do.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Stefanie C.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE?! The name of Bacon Bacon is like... meat that is so epic it just echoes when you say it once. My boyfriend and I live in the Castro District, so we decided to take a nice Sunday stroll here.

We ordered the Breakfast Sandwich and Breakfast Burrito to split, then the Porky Fries and Bacon Chili to save for later - yes we were feeling ambitious that day. Our food seemed to take forever to prepare. There is also not a lot of seating, so you might have to wait around for a bit and snatch a table when someone leaves. In the meantime, we enjoyed a tasty Hot Havana Latte.

The wait was so worth it though. The Breakfast Sandwich was my favorite out of all those choices. The egg was messy but the flavor was perfect. How could such a simple sandwich be so good? Would recommend. The other foods we got were also good. Would not recommend saving any of these for later like I tried to do.

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich with avocado added vs breakfast burrito - definitely get the sandwich as it'll have more texture.
The burrito was a bit too mushy.
Perhaps if they added some crispy bacon or French fries (; it'll give it a little more texture with the delicious flavor.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Jess W.
the breakfast sandwich.review: The breakfast sandwich with avocado added vs breakfast burrito - definitely get the sandwich as it'll have more texture. The burrito was a bit too mushy. Perhaps if they added some crispy bacon or French fries (; it'll give it a little more texture with the delicious flavor.

excerpts: I came here for breakfast with my roommate and we ordered the breakfast burrito and the breakfast sandwich.
We both were not too cray about the breakfast burrito even though they recommend the best thing on the menu.
It didn't have much spices and could use more ingredients.
As for the breakfast sandwich, it was bomb diggity!
The egg was cooked perfectly (yoked) and the bun was sweet and tasteful.
Definitely recommend the breakfast sandwich over the burrito.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Jenn L.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Yumm!! Definitely a fan of Bacon Bacon. They used to be food truck but now they opened a restaurant! The staffs are super nice, food comes out fast, great quality and they sell T-shirts! I actually got a shirt that made me laugh, "You had me at bacon" lollll! 

I came here for breakfast with my roommate and we ordered the breakfast burrito and the breakfast sandwich. We both were not too cray about the breakfast burrito even though they recommend the best thing on the menu. It didn't have much spices and could use more ingredients. As for the breakfast sandwich, it was bomb diggity! The egg was cooked perfectly (yoked) and the bun was sweet and tasteful. Definitely recommend the breakfast sandwich over the burrito. 

Overall, great breakfast spot and they also do lunch as well. I'll come back here again.

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich was VERY light, especially with the amount of bacon in this sandwich.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Trisha L.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
My boyfriend actually found this spot because we were both craving breakfast sandwiches and we absolutely miss Eggslut down in Southern California, so this was pretty much as close as we could get to eggslut (minus the whole menu being about eggs). Parking is EXTREMELY difficult, so I would recommend either taking public transportation here or finding parking a couple blocks away.

My boyfriend and I both ordered the bacon breakfast sandwich because we wanted something that had a runny egg in it,plus we were both intrigued by the bacon jam it had. We ended up taking it to go because we were double parked and luckily, Haight and Ashbury wasn't too far away. We drove over there and enjoyed our breakfast sandwiches, but my boyfriend ended up forgetting that the egg was going to be a runny yolk and it exploded all over his car + pants (LOL). The breakfast sandwich was VERY light, especially with the amount of bacon in this sandwich. Definitely something worth getting in the morning! 

The second time we came here,we wanted to order something off the lunch menu and we ended up getting the fried chicken sandwich. I have to say that I wasn't expecting the sandwich to be so big. There was TONS of fried chicken in that sandwich and to be honest, I couldn't finish it. I ended up getting a bit tired of the taste towards the end because of the bacon jam and the fried chicken, but honestly, it was still a pretty good sandwich (I can only eat half of it at once though).

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich is okay (good bun, good "bacon jelly"), but not substantial enough for me as a stand-alone.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Ryan D.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
This place is pretty underwhelming as a breakfast spot. Putting aside my dislike for over-the-top bacon worship, I just don't feel like Bacon Bacon nails any of their dishes. 

The breakfast sandwich is okay (good bun, good "bacon jelly"), but not substantial enough for me as a stand-alone. Maybe it could benefit from a sausage patty or something. 

The breakfast burrito is also serviceable and more filling, but less appealing/satisfying than what you'd get at most Mexican restaurants. I feel like their pulled pork texture doesn't jive well w/ the rest of the burrito. 

Final nail that keeps me from hitting Bacon Bacon breakfast more often is that they put crushed ice in their coffee instead of cubed -- watery iced coffee really gets my goat (or pig)!

excerpts: Apparently the breakfast sandwich and the burrito are pretty good, my breakfast bowl was super disappointing, didn't finish it.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Nicolas D.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Meh, long wait time, not cheap. Apparently the breakfast sandwich and the burrito are pretty good, my breakfast bowl was super disappointing, didn't finish it.

excerpts: Found the breakfast sandwich was a popular dish here
The breakfast sandwich was delicious!
The egg was definitely really gooey and messy, but oh so good.
Bacon, bacon jam - definitely added to the amazingness of the sandwich.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Nina Y.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
WHAT?

I was looking up places to eat on a Saturday morning and found Bacon Bacon. I've seen their truck various places, but I've had a few of their dishes. Found the breakfast sandwich was a popular dish here so I figured - Saturday morning with nothing to do, so i decided to take a bus and get there. 

The breakfast sandwich was delicious! The egg was definitely really gooey and messy, but oh so good.  Bacon, bacon jam - definitely added to the amazingness of the sandwich.  Amazing and loved it. 

Must try some of the lunch sandwiches next time.

Protip: breakfast sandwich is messy, but OH SO GOOD

excerpts: The tortilla for the burrito wasn't fresh, and the bacon in the breakfast sandwich was definitely reheated from previously being cooked.
Staff are super nice and friendly and the place is very cute!
the breakfast sandwich.author: Kristin S.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Really wanted to love this place, but honestly the food can easily be made at home for a fraction of the price. The tortilla for the burrito wasn't fresh, and the bacon in the breakfast sandwich was definitely reheated from previously being cooked. Staff are super nice and friendly and the place is very cute!

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich is one of the best breakfast sandos I've ever had.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Caroline L.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
This place is amazing. The breakfast sandwich is one of the best breakfast sandos I've ever had. The breakfast burrito is also scrumptious and not your average burrito- shredded pork with eggs, bacon, avocado + cheddar. 

The iced coffee is also great. They have crushed ice and almond milk.

excerpts: I got the breakfast sandwich as I was totally intrigued by the bacon jam.
Not the best name for this saucy delight
but I can't think of any other one that fits.
The counter person said it was their signature sandwich and it totally lived up to its designation:
Brioche bread, with a sunny-side up egg, bacon, more bacon, extra bacon, and bacon jam.
So good
the breakfast sandwich.author: S P.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
I love bacon and am tired of restaurants being stingy with my favorite breakfast meat. My brother lives around the corner and on my last visit, eating at Bacon Bacon was at the top of my list. Unfortunately, I didn't get here until my last day otherwise I would have eaten here for breakfast and lunch every day. Finally--a restaurant that fulfills my bacon cravings!!

I got the breakfast sandwich as I was totally intrigued by the bacon jam. Not the best name for this saucy delight but I can't think of any other one that fits. The counter person said it was their signature sandwich and it totally lived up to its designation: Brioche bread, with a sunny-side up egg, bacon, more bacon, extra bacon, and bacon jam. So good, I got one to take on the plane for my husband back in NYC. 

Good strong coffee to wash it all down. 

Best last breakfast in SF. Will definitely be coming back next trip--first thing ;)

excerpts: I had the breakfast sandwich and my bf ordered the breakfast burrito.
the sandwich was good but that breakfast burrito was soooo delicious.
The coffee was your typical medium roast but it was ok.
I think we will definitely pay a visit when we're in the area.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Karina A.
the breakfast sandwich.review: This place was amazing!! My bf and I were in SF for the weekend and came across this small place. They had a very simple menu. I had the breakfast sandwich and my bf ordered the breakfast burrito. the sandwich was good but that breakfast burrito was soooo delicious. The coffee was your typical medium roast but it was ok. I think we will definitely pay a visit when we're in the area.

excerpts: Yes, there were many items that you cannot find on the truck, but I was on a mission to try the breakfast sandwich with a fried egg, cheese, yummy bacon, and bacon jam.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Vanessa O.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Finally made it to the brick and mortar spot for Bacon Bacon and I could not be happier! Yes, there were many items that you cannot find on the truck, but I was on a mission to try the breakfast sandwich with a fried egg, cheese, yummy bacon, and bacon jam. It was sooooooooo good that I damn near finished it in under 3 minutes as the ooze of egg yolk ran down my hand. 

My next mission: banh mi sandwich.

excerpts: I had the breakfast sandwich and the breakfast burrito.
Both were good
but I enjoyed the sandwich more.
The sandwich was messy but the flavor of the egg and bacon stood out.
the breakfast sandwich.author: James W.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
The bacon here is delicious!! I had the breakfast sandwich and the breakfast burrito. Both were good but I enjoyed the sandwich more. The sandwich was messy but the flavor of the egg and bacon stood out. The bun was toasted to perfection. 

We had the maple bacon scone, once again I was not disappointed. The bacon did not dominate and the overall flavor was mild and sweet. 

Great job Bacon Bacon!!!

excerpts: I will note that my favorite items are the breakfast sandwich and the tuna sandwich.
I've tried just about everything else on the menu at this point, and I have yet to have a bad item.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Pat M.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Wait, how have I not reviewed this place before? Since they moved into the neighborhood, we've had them in heavy rotation for weekend breakfasts/lunches. We also hit their food truck pretty frequently at Off the Grid in the Haight on Thursday, where their hamburgers frequently play the role of "only thing our toddler will eat at the food trucks."
I won't waste your time by noting that pretty much everything but the croissants has bacon in it, but I will note that my favorite items are the breakfast sandwich and the tuna sandwich. I've tried just about everything else on the menu at this point, and I have yet to have a bad item. I'm not a coffee drinker, but I also have it on good secondary authority that they make a mean latte.

excerpts: I tried the burrito and the breakfast sandwich and I was pretty amazed by both of those choices.
The girlfriend and I went to two of their 'brick and mortar' locations and the food was exceptional at both places.
This will most definitely be our spot for delicious and savory breakfast when we go back to visit San Francisco.
In addition, I purchased a 24 ounce coffee and added a little bit of half-and-half.
The coffee was worth it as well.
Lastly, their pricing are very reasonable!
If you are staying anywhere near Haight-Ashbury or you can get to the downtown location, it is well worth it.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Jay P.
the breakfast sandwich.review: With a name like 'Bacon Bacon' how can you go wrong? I tried the burrito and the breakfast sandwich and I was pretty amazed by both of those choices. The girlfriend and I went to two of their 'brick and mortar' locations and the food was exceptional at both places. This will most definitely be our spot for delicious and savory breakfast when we go back to visit San Francisco. In addition, I purchased a 24 ounce coffee and added a little bit of half-and-half. The coffee was worth it as well. Lastly, their pricing are very reasonable! If you are staying anywhere near Haight-Ashbury or you can get to the downtown location, it is well worth it.

excerpts: I first ordered the breakfast sandwich and the first couple bites (non bacon bites mind you, since the egg was spilling outside of the bun) felt like a standard breakfast sandwich.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Andres B.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Have only been to the cafe location, not the truck, but have had great experiences. They do an effective job of setting expectations in the name - you should know what you're getting into here. They creatively, or sometimes obviously, incorporate delicious, delicious bacon into everything on the menu. 

I first ordered the breakfast sandwich and the first couple bites (non bacon bites mind you, since the egg was spilling outside of the bun) felt like a standard breakfast sandwich. Then I hit the bacon, and it vaulted this hand held to probably top 5 breakfast bites in the city. 

 I've had the burger as well, and while also quite tasty, I might recommend venturing into more interesting territory when ordering. The cafe and service itself was excellent, and there's a giant pig you can take a pic in front of if that's you're thing.

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich was just the fuel I needed for a long day of sightseeing.
I wish I could have tried everything on the menu, and my only disappointment is that I didn't get to stop by here for their lunch menu!
the breakfast sandwich.author: Monica M.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Excellent place for a quick breakfast while I was on vacation. The breakfast sandwich was just the fuel I needed for a long day of sightseeing. I wish I could have tried everything on the menu, and my only disappointment is that I didn't get to stop by here for their lunch menu!

excerpts: My son and I ordered the Breakfast Sandwich.
My daughter ordered the Bacon, Swiss Croissant.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Heidi M.
the breakfast sandwich.review: It was around lunch time and we were driving around San Francisco trying to figure out where to eat. A list of restaurants came up on our map, Bacon Bacon being one of them. Of course, the name immediately got our attention, so we had to come check it out. It did not disappoint. My son and I ordered the Breakfast Sandwich. My daughter ordered the Bacon, Swiss Croissant. My husband ordered the LGBT.  Three out of the four devoured our sandwiches. They were definitely outstanding. My son, who's a picky eater, was sad that his sandwich came with a fried egg instead of scrambled (my bad, I know he doesn't like fried egg, but wasn't thinking when I ordered). The super sweet and awesome guy working the counter noticed my son was unhappy and offered to make him another one with scrambled instead of fried. How awesome was that??!!!  My son had such a huge smile on his face!  Outstanding customer service!  I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who likes breakfast foods and burgers.

excerpts: the breakfast sandwich has perfect quality...fluffy brioche bun....perfect fried egg and of course thick cut bacon...cheese melting and holding together....just a great quality sandwich...good coffee to wash it down...excellent...
don't expect a quick meal...nearly empty and it took some time to get our orders...
the breakfast sandwich.author: Hen A.
the breakfast sandwich.review: modern and minimalistic...red pig statue...a menu board over the order counter...airy cafe vibe...coffee and breakfast sandwich...coffee and breakfast burrito for other...burrito or sandwich are both $7 each...burrito is bigger, heavier, meatier and more filling deliciousness...bacon, pork, cheese, eggs and loaded with flavors...rolled tight and dense...the breakfast sandwich has perfect quality...fluffy brioche bun....perfect fried egg and of course thick cut bacon...cheese melting and holding together....just a great quality sandwich...good coffee to wash it down...excellent...don't expect a quick meal...nearly empty and it took some time to get our orders...

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich and breakfast burrito are the best thing I've ever used to satisfy a dehydrated morning
:) the coffees are excellent as well.
The staff is very friendly and helpful and it is thankfully off the Haight Street path.
Love.
This.
Place.
the breakfast sandwich.author: David C.
the breakfast sandwich.review: This is absolutely my favorite place for breakfast/lunch in the Haight and maybe the city. I generally crave Cuban sandwiches and Bacon Bacon knocks theirs out of the park. The breakfast sandwich and breakfast burrito are the best thing I've ever used to satisfy a dehydrated morning :) the coffees are excellent as well. The staff is very friendly and helpful and it is thankfully off the Haight Street path. Love. This. Place.

excerpts: Favorite items are the breakfast sandwich and croissant with bacon jam.
OJ is fresh squeezed and coffee is always tasty and strong.
Not to mention the staff is always awesome.
Do yourself a favor and get some bacon in your life asap!
the breakfast sandwich.author: Kelsey T.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Im lucky enough to have this spot right down the street, it is AMAZING. Favorite items are the breakfast sandwich and croissant with bacon jam. OJ is fresh squeezed and coffee is always tasty and strong. Not to mention the staff is always awesome. Do yourself a favor and get some bacon in your life asap!

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich is also really good but the burrito is just next level.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Alex R.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
*This is for the ashbury heights location, not the truck 

BEST BREAKFAST BURRITO THAT I HAVE EVER HAD. Straight up. It is absolutely unreal. The breakfast sandwich is also really good but the burrito is just next level. 

Vanilla bean latte- unreal, esp cause I can opt for almond milk 
Fresh squeezed orange juice- actually unreal
They have Sriracha- unreal, because Sriracha is life 
overall, Bacon Bacon- unreal 

My only warning & complaint is that the food takes forever.. so call in your order ahead of time so you aren't waiting 20+ minutes for your dank burrito. ESP when you are starving and your hangover demands greasy yummy bacon enriched deliciousness in an immediate fashion.

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich was pretty tasty.
In the fridge they had slices of chocolate covered bacon, I brought one home as a gift for my mom....
holy sh*t
it was so good.
I was so upset I didn't bring home a bunch.
But prob for the best.
Was soooo good tho.
Deff give it a try!
the breakfast sandwich.author: Jamie W.
the breakfast sandwich.review: If you love bacon, come here!! The breakfast sandwich was pretty tasty. In the fridge they had slices of chocolate covered bacon, I brought one home as a gift for my mom....holy sh*t it was so good. I was so upset I didn't bring home a bunch. But prob for the best. Was soooo good tho. Deff give it a try!

excerpts: We each had the Breakfast Sandwich.
The brioche bun, eggs, and bacon were perfect.
Seriously it was amazing!!!
Wish we had a spot like this back in Denver.
the breakfast sandwich.author: J W.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Awesome spot. We each had the Breakfast Sandwich. The brioche bun, eggs, and bacon were perfect. Seriously it was amazing!!!  Wish we had a spot like this back in Denver.

excerpts: My friend tried the breakfast sandwich with hot chocolate and it didn't do her stomach well.
Which is why I ordered a lemonade.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Moriah P.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Get the bacon grilled cheese! It's so good! Don't do it with a sweet drink because that's just too much for your stomach. My friend tried the breakfast sandwich with hot chocolate and it didn't do her stomach well. Which is why I ordered a lemonade.

excerpts: My dad had the breakfast sandwich which was huge and covered with cheese, egg and of course more bacon.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Kev R.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Stopped by for breakfast and it was a really good find.  As the name would suggest bacon is on everything but they do it well.

I opted for a light breakfast of a cheese and bacon scone and split a bouquet of bacon(6strips of bacon) with everyone else.  It didn't disappoint, the bacon was the high point and they are doing it well there.

My dad had the breakfast sandwich which was huge and covered with cheese, egg and of course more bacon.

I would definitely go back if in the area.

excerpts: I generally get the breakfast sandwich, but the scone is a winner too.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Milan T.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
This is place is the bomb. The bacon bomb. They know their bacon and they do it right every time. I generally get the breakfast sandwich, but the scone is a winner too.

My most fun experience was actually with the Bacon Bacon food truck. They hosted a 3 course dinner for two special in their truck. My girlfriend and I went and it was awesome! We got to sit in the front of the truck and were brought course after course of delicious bacon treats for the next 1.5 hours. Yes, my arteries are now clogged.

excerpts: I have only tried the Breakfast sandwich from here and it is so yummy!
Love the sweet/salty combo of the shredded pork with the bacon.
The egg is cooked perfectly where it is still a runny goodness.
Everything together with melted cheese on a soft brioche bun makes the breakfast sandwich perfect.
I also tried a sample of their bacon scone and it was also delicious.
What can go wrong with bacon?
If its your first time going to the cafe location, the store can be hard to find since it doesn't have any clear sign.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Arda S.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
I have only tried the Breakfast sandwich from here and it is so yummy! Love the sweet/salty combo of the shredded pork with the bacon. The egg is cooked perfectly where it is still a runny goodness. Everything together with melted cheese on a soft brioche bun makes the breakfast sandwich perfect. I also tried a sample of their bacon scone and it was also delicious. What can go wrong with bacon? 
If its your first time going to the cafe location, the store can be hard to find since it doesn't have any clear sign.

excerpts: Everything had bacon in it, I had the breakfast sandwich with bacon, fried egg and cheese no picture to post as I couldn't wait to dig in...
it was amazing.
The cashiers were also so nice service was fast.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Katherine B.
the breakfast sandwich.review: One word...delicious!!! Everything had bacon in it, I had the breakfast sandwich with bacon, fried egg and cheese no picture to post as I couldn't wait to dig in...it was amazing.  The cashiers were also so nice service was fast.

excerpts: I tried the breakfast sandwich and was impressed.
The bacon of course was delicious and I loved the bread they used for the sandwich.
Would definitely go again!
the breakfast sandwich.author: Ricky S.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
I took a chance coming here and was not disappointed.  Nice neighborhood and parking was easy for me to find.

Shop is small, but inviting with some modern amenities.  I tried the breakfast sandwich and was impressed.  The bacon of course was delicious and I loved the bread they used for the sandwich.  Would definitely go again!

excerpts: I had the breakfast sandwich, maple bacon scone with bacon jam, and a their drip coffee.
Everything was absolutely delicious!
The bacon jam was a pleasant surprise and is inspiring me to learn how to make it myself
the breakfast sandwich.author: Mary K.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
I have been dying to try Bacon Bacon after seeing them on a couple of food specials.  I went to Bacon Bacon for breakfast this morning and I was in bacon heaven.  I love my bacon!  I had the breakfast sandwich, maple bacon scone with bacon jam, and a their drip coffee.  Everything was absolutely delicious!  The bacon jam was a pleasant surprise and is inspiring me to learn how to make it myself but I'm sure it won't be as good as Bacon Bacon's.  

Their kitchen/storefront is small with little seating, so you will most likely have to take your meal to go or stand and eat at the counters.  The place was very clean and the staff are friendly.  It was worth the drive from Walnut Creek.  For all you bacon lovers, this place is a must.

excerpts: I ordered the breakfast sandwich.
Ingredients are: Bacon, fried egg, cheddar, bacon jam, brioche bun - $7
It typically comes with an egg over easy
but I substituted scrambled eggs as I'm not a fan of runny yolk.
All I can say is this breakfast sandwich is heaven!
You can tell the ingredients are all the best possible.
All of the ingredients compliment each other perfectly.
The bacon is thick and cooked perfectly.
Not rubbery or overly cooked.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Alisa M.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
I had possibly the best breakfast sandwich of my life from this place yesterday!  I moved a block and a half away from this little gem a couple months ago and I can't believe I waited so long to stop in.
The handwritten sign kind of turned me off from checking it out I think... felt temporary/makeshift (get a real one, guys!).
I ordered the breakfast sandwich.  Ingredients are: Bacon, fried egg, cheddar, bacon jam, brioche bun - $7
It typically comes with an egg over easy but I substituted scrambled eggs as I'm not a fan of runny yolk.  
All I can say is this breakfast sandwich is heaven!  You can tell the ingredients are all the best possible.  All of the ingredients compliment each other perfectly.  The bacon is thick and cooked perfectly.  Not rubbery or overly cooked.  The bacon jam gives the sandwich a slight sweetness and makes it even richer.

They have great coffee too, which is a nice surprise.  I love a full - bodied cup o' Joe and it's hard to find around these parts (La Boulange has good coffee but it's a little bit of a walk).  

Hugh was working and was super accomodating, nice and helpful.  Looking forward to my next breakfast sandwich!  They also have bacon scones which are very intriguing.

excerpts:
The breakfast sandwich
2.
the breakfast sandwich.author: John D.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Items ordered:
1. The breakfast sandwich
2. The almost vegetarian breakfast sandwich

The reason for the low ranking is that both sandwiches were remarkably bland. The only flavor that comes through on the regular breakfast sandwich is a mild hint of the bacon syrup. While this is a nice flavor, it is quickly absorbed by the cardboard (brioche) bun.

The almost vegetarian sandwich is similarly dominated by one flavor, but in this case it is the broccolini doing the heavy lifting. With a little salt to balance the bitterness of the broccolini and more red peppers to add sweetness, this sandwich could be improved. However, the floppy, flavorless brioche bun ends up sucking any life out of the sandwich, so like it or not, the flavor disappears anyway.

excerpts: As it was my first time visiting Bacon Bacon i asked what was good, and received the breakfast sandwich.
Mind.
Blown.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Genni V.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
My love affair with bacon has truly begun.
I think i may just become a regular here yet.
As it was my first time visiting Bacon Bacon i asked what was good, and received the breakfast sandwich. Mind. Blown.

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich was probably the best, delicious bread
and I really appreciated the runny egg for some dipping.
The folks working there, especially some fellow known as "Daddy" were super friendly and we were even given a cheeseburger to try for free.
Thick slices of bacon, again w delicious poppy-seed bun, was surprisingly easy to eat considering the feast we had just sampled.
Oh, and the coffee options are outstanding.
Bacon Bacon and the great folks that work there got my weekend off to an ideal start.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Jacob C.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Just got into town, my brother took me to bacon bacon and good god, it is fantastic. I sampled a number of dishes as I had already technically eaten breakfast. But I couldn't resist. Giant pulled pork, egg, bacon, avocado and cheese burrito was fantastic, the pork well cooked and everything just glommed together perfectly. The breakfast sandwich was probably the best, delicious bread and I really appreciated the runny egg for some dipping. The folks working there, especially some fellow known as "Daddy" were super friendly and we were even given a cheeseburger to try for free. Thick slices of bacon, again w delicious poppy-seed bun, was surprisingly easy to eat considering the feast we had just sampled. Oh, and the coffee options are outstanding. Bacon Bacon and the great folks that work there got my weekend off to an ideal start.

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich is incredible: the mixture of egg, bacon, cheese and whatever awesomeness they use for the bun consistently delivers a melt-in-the-mouth taste that is really hard to beat anywhere else.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Matt V.
the breakfast sandwich.review:
Absolutely love this place!

The breakfast sandwich is incredible: the mixture of egg, bacon, cheese and whatever awesomeness they use for the bun consistently delivers a melt-in-the-mouth taste that is really hard to beat anywhere else.

The staff is super friendly and welcoming as well with fast service.

If you are in a hurry for a quick and delicious breakfast (or even if you are not in a hurry), this is the place to go.

excerpts: The breakfast sandwich and burrito were AMAZING!
Although I preferred the sandwich over the burrito.
Way better than EGGSLUT in my book!
the breakfast sandwich.author: Frank H.
the breakfast sandwich.review: OHHHHH MAAAAAN! After a long drive from LA, my girlfriend and I were on the search  for a place to grab breakfast.  While the line at Mama's was incredibly long, we just decided to come here. First of all, they did not disappoint with the food! The breakfast sandwich and burrito were AMAZING! Although I preferred the sandwich over the burrito. Way better than EGGSLUT in my book!

excerpts: Likely the best breakfast sandwich in the history of the breakfast sandwich.
the breakfast sandwich.author: Margaret B.
the breakfast sandwich.review: Likely the best breakfast sandwich in the history of the breakfast sandwich. Loved the almost veggie one (yes, it has bacon). Others had the regular breakfast sandwich with bacon jam (think pulled pork BBQ) and the burger. The 2-patty cheese burger with bacon and grilled onions was quite something. Delicious.

excerpts: I'm a huge fan of the breakfast sandwich, which is an egg over easy with cheddar cheese, lots of delicious, thick-cut bacon, and bacon jam on the most delicious roll!
Never a fan of runny eggs, I order mine with scrambled and they have always been happy to oblige.
Bacon jam sounded weird at first, and admittedly, I did order the sandwich once without it, but never again.
It totally pulls the sandwich together and is delicious!
Otherwise, the bacon cheddar scone is also really good.
If you're a bacon connoisseur, you would probably enjoy the bacon bouquet, which is just a bunch of bacon, wrapped up together, ready to eat.
I have yet to go there for lunch, but the menu looks divine so it's on my list.
The storefront is teeny tiny, but there are stools and there's room to eat at the countertops.
It's not uncommon to see people standing outside with their friends, kids, and/or pups enjoying a delicious sandwich.
The staff are super friendly and overall, it's just a great experience.
Check it out!
the breakfast sandwich.author: Amy J.
the breakfast sandwich.review: This place is awesome.   We stop by the Frederick storefront as frequently as we can on weekends and are SO glad they're now open on Sundays!  Note - it's not always super easy to find parking around there, as it's smack in the middle of a residential neighborhood, but whatever - hop on the N line, take a bus, or circle the block because IT'S WORTH IT!   I'm a huge fan of the breakfast sandwich, which is an egg over easy with cheddar cheese, lots of delicious, thick-cut bacon, and bacon jam on the most delicious roll!   Never a fan of runny eggs, I order mine with scrambled and they have always been happy to oblige.   Bacon jam sounded weird at first, and admittedly, I did order the sandwich once without it, but never again.  It totally pulls the sandwich together and is delicious!     Otherwise, the bacon cheddar scone is also really good.  If you're a bacon connoisseur, you would probably enjoy the bacon bouquet, which is just a bunch of bacon, wrapped up together, ready to eat. :)   I have yet to go there for lunch, but the menu looks divine so it's on my list.  The storefront is teeny tiny, but there are stools and there's room to eat at the countertops.   It's not uncommon to see people standing outside with their friends, kids, and/or pups enjoying a delicious sandwich.   The staff are super friendly and overall, it's just a great experience.  Check it out!

excerpts:
YUMMMM

DONT get me wrong, the breakfast burrito was good.
the breakfast burrito.author: SA M.
the breakfast burrito.review:
This place is goood! If you love bacon come give it a try. There's some fun things on the menu. I was torn between the classic breakfast burrito and the breakfast sandwich. So I got both, because why not?!? But I have to say the breakfast sandwich was to die for. The bun is out of this world. Then the bacon jam and gooey cheddar cheese and bacon and fried egg. YUMMMM

DONT get me wrong, the breakfast burrito was good. But it was exactly as ordered a classic breakfast burrito. It was good. There's just something about that bacon jam and that bun on the sandwich. 

Oh and I got a Vietnamese iced coffee because I've been up since 4 AM, and I need a mid day/morning pick me up. 

There's a cute little mechanical pig you can ride. There's sweatshirts, hats and T-shirt's you can buy. And my food came out within 5 minutes. I highly recommend it!!!!

excerpts: I ordered the breakfast sandwich and my fiancé ordered the breakfast burrito (with pork).
the breakfast burrito.author: Cecilia C.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Wanted something quick and delicious for breakfast so we stumbled across Bacon Bacon and followed the reviews!

I ordered the breakfast sandwich and my fiancé ordered the breakfast burrito (with pork). 

Our food came out incredibly fast - sandwich had their special bacon jam, which really looked like pulled pork, but wasn't anything too special to me, though it seems to be a hit with everyone else! I don't have a huge sweet tooth, so I'm sure I would have enjoyed this more if I was more of a sweets fan. 

I loved the gooey cheesiness of this sandwich and the bun is really a star! The bacon, of course, was great. 

The sandwich was delicious, but not the best breakfast sandwich I've ever had. I think the pricing is fair and though the sandwich may look small, it's the perfect amount of food. 

If you're a coffee fan, they have a pretty good Vietnamese coffee. I especially like the ice that comes in it. Almost slushy like. 

I'm definitely wanting to go back to try some more of their menu items. Bacon on everything is the way to go!

excerpts: The breakfast burrito and breakfast sandwich were both amazing!
The sitting area on the inside is a bit small and crowded during the morning, but it was still a pretty cozy place.
My boyfriend
and I both enjoyed it
the breakfast burrito.author: Toni S.
the breakfast burrito.review: The breakfast burrito and breakfast sandwich were both amazing! The sitting area on the inside is a bit small and crowded during the morning, but it was still a pretty cozy place. My boyfriend and I both enjoyed it

excerpts: I got the breakfast burrito, but also tried some of my coworker's bacon fries.
Both items were chock full of bacon and meat.
The burrito was stuffed with filling which I appreciated.
Not sure if they offer hot sauces at the location, but this was great with some heat.
(I always have multiple hot sauces at my desk.)
the breakfast burrito.author: Elena N.
the breakfast burrito.review:
So I decided to get two burritos for lunch. Some of my coworkers thought I was being ridiculous, but I didn't care. (Apparently two burritos is too much?) I went ahead and did it anyways. Our office lunch delivery arrived by Caviar on Friday, April 20th around 12:30pm.

*Bacon Fries: French fries tossed in herbs, parmesan, spicy olive oil, homemade bacon bits, and bacon jam served with a side of blue cheese vinaigrette ($7.50)
*Breakfast Burrito: Scrambled egg, pork shoulder, bacon, avocado, and cheddar ($8.50)

I got the breakfast burrito, but also tried some of my coworker's bacon fries. Both items were chock full of bacon and meat. The burrito was stuffed with filling which I appreciated. Not sure if they offer hot sauces at the location, but this was great with some heat. (I always have multiple hot sauces at my desk.) The fries were good, but suffered from the transport time as they were soggy. Still good flavor. Though they didn't deliver the blue cheese vinaigrette, so I was missing that cheesy element.

Great breakfast burrito. If they were close to work, I'd get it more often. Maybe the next time Bacon Bacon rolls around as an office lunch option.

excerpts: My husband got the Breakfast Burrito - which really just tasted like meat - so not as well balanced.
the breakfast burrito.author: Sarah C.
the breakfast burrito.review:
I'm feeling a little boarder line about the 4 stars - mostly I just don't feel like I know enough to appropriately rate it, but from the look of the menu  it seems like I would go with 4 if I knew it better.  

I got the classic breakfast burrito which was really quite good. Not the best breakfast burrito I've ever had but they did a good job of having simple flavors that each came out - I could taste the bacon, egg, and avocado clearly.

My husband got the Breakfast Burrito - which really just tasted like meat - so not as well balanced. Both were good sized - we came out full.

Good light in the space. Counter service. Very few people there when we went in, so it was quick, but might be different if it were busy. 

But don't go here if you don't like bacon - it's on pretty much everything, and is the point of going.

excerpts: We got the bacon maple scone and the breakfast burrito (regular, not classic).
We sat down at one of the tables and waited for our food.
I started on the maple bacon scone, I love scones, but I've never been much of a fan of maple bacon, but let me tell you, it was pretty damn good!
Not overly dry, not cakey, it was what I expect of a scone.
It even had a pile of bacon up top with some maple drizzled over it.
YUM.
Finally our food came, and I took one look at that breakfast burrito and instantly fell in love.
I love when you can see the distinct layers in food, especially my burritos.
Much appreciated.
Added the Valencia hot sauce (sits on each table, along with Ketchup, sriracha, and mustard).
MA DAM.
I only had to take 1 bite to tell it was incredible.
Juicy.
Took another bite to make sure it was real, and boy was it.
My friend devoured it in a split, 2 seconds.
I saw another table with fries and it looked like perfection as well, nice size with a crispy outer layer, that looked pretty soft inside.
the breakfast burrito.author: Eva C.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Bacon Bacon Bacon Bacon Bacon! Dank. Wet. Lit. Poppin. Smacks. This place has been bookmarked for a minute, because I LOVE BACON, I just haven't found a chance to try it until now. I'm a fan, I will be back. Price point is typical of an SF restaurant, so expect to spend about $10-15 for a meal.

Came in around lunch on a Sunday, place was packed, but saying that, there isn't much seating to begin with. I would say about 20 seats. But we stood in the short line and ordered pretty quickly. We got the bacon maple scone and the breakfast burrito (regular, not classic). We sat down at one of the tables and waited for our food. I started on the maple bacon scone, I love scones, but I've never been much of a fan of maple bacon, but let me tell you, it was pretty damn good! Not overly dry, not cakey, it was what I expect of a scone. It even had a pile of bacon up top with some maple drizzled over it. YUM. Finally our food came, and I took one look at that breakfast burrito and instantly fell in love. I love when you can see the distinct layers in food, especially my burritos. Much appreciated. Added the Valencia hot sauce (sits on each table, along with Ketchup, sriracha, and mustard). MA DAM. I only had to take 1 bite to tell it was incredible. Juicy. Took another bite to make sure it was real, and boy was it. My friend devoured it in a split, 2 seconds. I saw another table with fries and it looked like perfection as well, nice size with a crispy outer layer, that looked pretty soft inside. Anyways, I will be back to try the fries, the mac and cheese balls, and the chicken sandwich. They all looked sooooo good. I had eaten a late breakfast so I wasn't hungry enough to eat more, otherwise, I would have went in.

Food = dank
Price = normal
Service = good
Seating = limited
Parking = hills + limited

excerpts: Staff was great, but the breakfast burrito was terrible.
As soon as I took a bite, grease started pouring out.
The burrito was in a little paper bag that was half filled with grease after a few bites.
the breakfast burrito.author: Sasha R.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Staff was great, but the breakfast burrito was terrible.  As soon as I took a bite, grease started pouring out.  The burrito was in a little paper bag that was half filled with grease after a few bites.  I ended up throwing it away, because it was pretty gross.  

Perhaps I chose the wrong thing??

excerpts: We split the breakfast burrito and sandwich.
the breakfast burrito.author: Erik H.
the breakfast burrito.review:
There are lots of places that have caught on to the bacon craze, but there still is truth to going to a place that focuses on bacon to get the best of the best.

While the trucks still work as great advertisers to new people to the concept, this original location in the Haight still is my go to place although the owner, Jim, spends more time at his bigger 3rd street location.  

While the menu has changed over the years, many of the classics are still there like the breakfast sandwich and breakfast burrito.  The Banh Mi sandwich recently returned to the menu at this location as well.  

Many menu items have returned after the historic battle with anti-swine neighbors that resulted in a nice plug on SNL, but the casualty is the pork belly sandwich I figure just became too expensive.

This location gets packed in weekends while the other location is more for the working crowd so be prepared to grab a cup of coffee and wait.  Parking can be difficult as well, but it is all worth it right?

What did I have this time around?  We split the breakfast burrito and sandwich.  

Yes they will always have me at Bacon!!

excerpts: The breakfast burrito is to die for .
So don't ask for the calorie count, JUST EAT IT!!!
Your taste buds will thank you later.
The rest of the menu must be good too, especially since it has bacon.
Sandwich with bacon, burrito with bacon, fries with bacon, SALAD, yep, with bacon.
the breakfast burrito.author: Andy R.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Despite walking half a mile that felt like 10 due to the incline of the hills, this little spot called Bacon Bacon is heaven for those bacon lovers. By the way, who doesn't LOVE BACON RIGHT!!!  If it wasn't good for us then why did the lord put it on earth for us. Things that make you go hmmm.  

Anyways, we came for breakfast so i can only speak for that part of the menu. The breakfast burrito is to die for . So don't ask for the calorie count, JUST EAT IT!!! Your taste buds will thank you later. The rest of the menu must be good too, especially since it has bacon. Sandwich with bacon, burrito with bacon, fries with bacon, SALAD, yep, with bacon.  So don't miss out on this place if you are a bacon lover. 

2 thumbs up . Best bacon spot ever!!

excerpts: The breakfast is also great but the breakfast burrito has always been so extra greasy
I wouldn't recommend that.
Will definitely be back sometime tho!
the breakfast burrito.author: Emily F.
the breakfast burrito.review: Such a great place. Have been multiple times for breakfast and once for lunch now. I had the fried chicken sandwich and was so great! The flavors were on point and the chicken was nice and crisp. Also had the fried Mac and cheese balls. This obviously isn't a place to try if eating healthy. The breakfast is also great but the breakfast burrito has always been so extra greasy I wouldn't recommend that. Will definitely be back sometime tho!

excerpts: I had the Breakfast Burrito and that was good.
It was super heavy
and I felt like my heart was going to stop after I was done.
the breakfast burrito.author: Mal L.
the breakfast burrito.review:
This place is overhyped, super bummed it wasn't as good as what I dreamed about. I've been to both locations. The one in Haight I got the Cuban and there was a decent amount of meat on there but it was super dry. The meat was good though. My husband got the Bird and he had the same problem, not enough sauce. 

When the King St. location was open I had the Breakfast Burrito and that was good. It was super heavy and I felt like my heart was going to stop after I was done. It wasn't anything outstanding, just a typical breakfast burrito. 

There is no parking ... so good luck. Pricing is average.

If this was the only place to eat in the area I'd go here again but it's not a spot I crave or keep wanting to go back too.

excerpts: Got the breakfast burrito and it was unfortunately a little, WET, which is great for certain things....but not my egg filled burrito.
Maybe I just caught them at a bad time because everything on the menu looked good.
Must come back to give it another try but for now...be careful of the breakfast burttitooooo
the breakfast burrito.author: Vince L.
the breakfast burrito.review: Got the breakfast burrito and it was unfortunately a little, WET, which is great for certain things....but not my egg filled burrito.  Maybe I just caught them at a bad time because everything on the menu looked good.  Must come back to give it another try but for now...be careful of the breakfast burttitooooo

excerpts: I came here for breakfast with my roommate and we ordered the breakfast burrito and the breakfast sandwich.
We both were not too cray about the breakfast burrito even though they recommend the best thing on the menu.
It didn't have much spices and could use more ingredients.
As for the breakfast sandwich, it was bomb diggity!
The egg was cooked perfectly (yoked) and the bun was sweet and tasteful.
Definitely recommend the breakfast sandwich over the burrito.
the breakfast burrito.author: Jenn L.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Yumm!! Definitely a fan of Bacon Bacon. They used to be food truck but now they opened a restaurant! The staffs are super nice, food comes out fast, great quality and they sell T-shirts! I actually got a shirt that made me laugh, "You had me at bacon" lollll! 

I came here for breakfast with my roommate and we ordered the breakfast burrito and the breakfast sandwich. We both were not too cray about the breakfast burrito even though they recommend the best thing on the menu. It didn't have much spices and could use more ingredients. As for the breakfast sandwich, it was bomb diggity! The egg was cooked perfectly (yoked) and the bun was sweet and tasteful. Definitely recommend the breakfast sandwich over the burrito. 

Overall, great breakfast spot and they also do lunch as well. I'll come back here again.

excerpts: The sizes of the portions are definitely overwhelming and filling, but I think that the breakfast burrito is average at best.
the breakfast burrito.author: Cindy N.
the breakfast burrito.review:
This is a small spot my friends and I stopped by before heading to Golden Gate park. We came around 1pm on a Saturday and managed to snag the big table in the back, but I think that depends a lot on luck. Hearing that the breakfast burritos "were to die for," my friends and I went for that and the Banh Mi. 

After watching a number of customers behind us get their orders first (maybe because they were to-go? still unknown...), we finally (and slowly) got all our orders. The sizes of the portions are definitely overwhelming and filling, but I think that the breakfast burrito is average at best. I'm not usually a fan of bacon, but I was a bit disappointed to see that the bacon at a place known for bacon was not very impressive. 

Overall, the service was slow, the food was average, and it's a tight squeeze to find a place to sit. Would think about it before going here again.

excerpts: The breakfast burrito is also serviceable and more filling, but less appealing/satisfying than what you'd get at most Mexican restaurants.
I feel like their pulled pork texture doesn't jive well w/
the breakfast burrito.author: Ryan D.
the breakfast burrito.review:
This place is pretty underwhelming as a breakfast spot. Putting aside my dislike for over-the-top bacon worship, I just don't feel like Bacon Bacon nails any of their dishes. 

The breakfast sandwich is okay (good bun, good "bacon jelly"), but not substantial enough for me as a stand-alone. Maybe it could benefit from a sausage patty or something. 

The breakfast burrito is also serviceable and more filling, but less appealing/satisfying than what you'd get at most Mexican restaurants. I feel like their pulled pork texture doesn't jive well w/ the rest of the burrito. 

Final nail that keeps me from hitting Bacon Bacon breakfast more often is that they put crushed ice in their coffee instead of cubed -- watery iced coffee really gets my goat (or pig)!

excerpts: Ended up getting the breakfast burrito and it did not disappoint!
A little pricey (as expected) but definitely would order again!
the breakfast burrito.author: Joshua H.
the breakfast burrito.review: This place is as bacon as it gets! I was looking for a good breakfast spot in the area and happened to find this gem super close by! Being a bacon lover, I had no idea on what to order since everything on the menu sounded good. Ended up getting the breakfast burrito and it did not disappoint! A little pricey (as expected) but definitely would order again!

excerpts: and once for the breakfast burrito.
Honestly, I found both to be underwhelming and lacking flavor.
I think most disappointing was that the bacon both times was average.
A place called Bacon Bacon - you'd think the bacon would be top notch!
the breakfast burrito.author: Russ S.
the breakfast burrito.review:
I've been to Bacon Bacon twice now - once for the California Burrito and once for the breakfast burrito. Honestly, I found both to be underwhelming and lacking flavor. I think most disappointing was that the bacon both times was average. A place called Bacon Bacon - you'd think the bacon would be top notch! It wasn't.

I'll eat here again (probably hungover) because it's easy and local to me, not because it's particularly good.

excerpts: My mom ordered the  breakfast sandwich and I ordered the breakfast burrito.
We split both of the items we ordered.
Honestly I thought my sandwich was pretty bland and the burrito was just OK.
the breakfast burrito.author: Christine P.
the breakfast burrito.review:
I love BACON.  So does my son.  He can have it everyday if he had the choice. 

I've been wanting to try Bacon Bacon for some time but have never had the chance, until today.  My mom and I were in the area and were a little hungry so we decided to stop by Bacon Bacon.   It was just around breakfast so we decided to stick with the breakfast menu which I regret now!  I think I may have ordered the wrong items because upon reading other Yelper reviews, they all seem to love it. 

My experience on the other hand was just OK.  My mom ordered the  breakfast sandwich and I ordered the breakfast burrito.  We split both of the items we ordered.  
Honestly I thought my sandwich was pretty bland and the burrito was just OK.  That won't deter me from coming because they had other items that I definitely want to try. 

The restaurant is fairly small but there is definitely room to sit and eat.  They also have a mechanical pig that your little boy or girl can ride! I don't know if I would sit on that thing as an adult with the fear of breaking it. But it's a cute, kitschy thing to have in the restaurant.  They also sell Bacon Bacon shirts, chocolate dipped bacon, cookies and popcorn which I skipped out on but may try in the future. 

Overall verdict: I will come back to try the rest of the menu.  The breakfast items I did order were just OK.  But I love bacon, so this place is definitely a plus in my book.

excerpts: My favorite is the breakfast burrito, and the porky fries are also bomb if you're hungry enough!
the breakfast burrito.author: Tracy C.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Apparently I'm #2 when it comes to Yelp check-ins, so it's about time I wrote a review! 

Bacon Bacon is one of my go-to for quick weekend brunch, especially since I live so close. Not only do they have an amazing selection of bacon-products, but it's also not crazy expensive as brunch can sometimes be. My favorite is the breakfast burrito, and the porky fries are also bomb if you're hungry enough! 

They have a limited amount of seating (4 tables and a bench), so weekends can get a little hectic if you're planning on eating there. But luckily service is pretty fast so people are in and out quickly!

Definitely a must-try if you love bacon. Also try their food truck if you're at off the grid!

excerpts: My favorite things to get consistently are the breakfast burrito, the cup of chili to-go, and iced almond milk lattes.
the breakfast burrito.author: Megan D.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Bacon Bacon is a great casual breakfast & brunch spot, I couldn't be happier to live as close to it as I do.

My favorite things to get consistently are the breakfast burrito, the cup of chili to-go, and iced almond milk lattes.

Their sandwiches are also very good!

I love the staff and also their use of compostable materials. 

Also, mochas with bacon crumples on top!!!

excerpts: The breakfast burrito is also scrumptious and not your average burrito- shredded pork with eggs, bacon, avocado + cheddar.
the breakfast burrito.author: Caroline L.
the breakfast burrito.review:
This place is amazing. The breakfast sandwich is one of the best breakfast sandos I've ever had. The breakfast burrito is also scrumptious and not your average burrito- shredded pork with eggs, bacon, avocado + cheddar. 

The iced coffee is also great. They have crushed ice and almond milk.

excerpts: I had the breakfast sandwich and my bf ordered the breakfast burrito.
the sandwich was good but that breakfast burrito was soooo delicious.
The coffee was your typical medium roast but it was ok.
I think we will definitely pay a visit when we're in the area.
the breakfast burrito.author: Karina A.
the breakfast burrito.review: This place was amazing!! My bf and I were in SF for the weekend and came across this small place. They had a very simple menu. I had the breakfast sandwich and my bf ordered the breakfast burrito. the sandwich was good but that breakfast burrito was soooo delicious. The coffee was your typical medium roast but it was ok. I think we will definitely pay a visit when we're in the area.

excerpts: Got the breakfast burrito and couldn't have been happier.
Pretty sure the guy behind the counter was the owner, and he was the man.
Definitely coming back for lunch.
the breakfast burrito.author: Dean H.
the breakfast burrito.review: The food is awesome, and the service is even better. Got the breakfast burrito and couldn't have been happier. Pretty sure the guy behind the counter was the owner, and he was the man. Definitely coming back for lunch.

excerpts: I had the breakfast sandwich and the breakfast burrito.
Both were good
but I enjoyed the sandwich more.
The sandwich was messy but the flavor of the egg and bacon stood out.
the breakfast burrito.author: James W.
the breakfast burrito.review:
The bacon here is delicious!! I had the breakfast sandwich and the breakfast burrito. Both were good but I enjoyed the sandwich more. The sandwich was messy but the flavor of the egg and bacon stood out. The bun was toasted to perfection. 

We had the maple bacon scone, once again I was not disappointed. The bacon did not dominate and the overall flavor was mild and sweet. 

Great job Bacon Bacon!!!

excerpts: The breakfast burrito tasted like pulled pork with melted cheese and squishy baby food consistency avocado.
It was so "wet" and greasy, the smell stuck to me for hours.
The bacon chicken burger had the thinnest slice of really crunchy overly deep fried Panko crusted chicken breast known to man and by now you could probably guess...
the breakfast burrito.author: Betty V.
the breakfast burrito.review:
After reading reviews, looking at photos, researching thoroughly, we made the trek to Cole Valley. This seemed like a bacon lover's dream come true, but now that I've been here , I don't need to return and here's why...

1. This place is tiny with very little seating. Read that as noisy, cramped and super annoying when you're sitting next to the mechanical horse thing with screeching children a foot away giggling gleefully ,so you feel like an asshole if you say anything. 
2. It took forever, ok the figurative forever, about 25 minutes, to get 3 sandwiches. That's an average of 8 minutes per sandwich! Understaffed? 
3. It ain't cheap. With all the extra money you're making, how about hiring more staff. See point #2. 
4. Most importantly, it's called Bacon Bacon you'd think they would use quality bacon. Come on!! Instead the bacon was thin, flavorless, barely there and tasted like the cheap Kirkland (aka Costco) brand. Sad face. If they had used Applewood smoked bacon, you'd be able to taste it. Instead everything tasted like pulled pork. if you add hot sauce, you'll definitely not taste bacon and you'll have to change the name of the sandwich cause now it's just misleading. 

The Cuban tasted like pulled pork with melted cheese and bland roasted red peppers. 
The breakfast burrito tasted like pulled pork with melted cheese and squishy baby food consistency avocado. It was so "wet" and greasy, the smell stuck to me for hours. 
The bacon chicken burger had the thinnest slice of really crunchy overly deep fried Panko crusted chicken breast known to man and by now you could probably guess...the bacon was not noticeable and bland bland bland. 

Echoing what another reviewer said, due to blandness, condiments have to be added. Bbq sauce would make more sense as something available to use. 

All these people who gave this place 5 stars are either friends of the proprietors, getting kick backs or living under a rock so anything would taste amazeballs. I was massively disappointed.

excerpts: The breakfast burrito is more like a carnitas burrito with bacon and egg.
Not exactly what I expected, but still pretty damn good.
the breakfast burrito.author: Huey N.
the breakfast burrito.review: The breakfast burrito is more like a carnitas burrito with bacon and egg. Not exactly what I expected, but still pretty damn good.

excerpts: Highly recommend the breakfast burrito that is very different that would you would expect.
the breakfast burrito.author: Manny F.
the breakfast burrito.review: Amazing find on our way out of SF! The entire family loved it. Highly recommend the breakfast burrito that is very different that would you would expect. The wife had the bacon grilled cheese. Coffee was so good that we had to get some more for the road back home. We will def be making this a regular visit on our next SF road trip.

excerpts: The breakfast burrito is amazing.
Get it for sure.
They have the perfect blend of cheese, bacon, veggies, and sauce.
My mouth is watering...must go back.
the breakfast burrito.author: Mio W.
the breakfast burrito.review: Absolutely delicious! The breakfast burrito is amazing. Get it for sure. They have the perfect blend of cheese, bacon, veggies, and sauce. My mouth is watering...must go back.

excerpts: The Breakfast Burrito is killer -
I ate a half at a time, so for like $8 a burrito was two meals!
the breakfast burrito.author: Emily P.
the breakfast burrito.review:
On our visit to SF, I managed to go twice to Bacon Bacon in our four days there.  That is how good it is.  The Breakfast Burrito is killer - I ate a half at a time, so for like $8 a burrito was two meals! Score for me.

Very helpful staff, great coffee, and just an amazing taste.  Perfect mix of salty and savory and creamy and crunchy and wonderful.

excerpts: The breakfast burrito is also tasty if you like a LOT of meat.
the breakfast burrito.author: Jessica H.
the breakfast burrito.review:
I love having this place in my neighborhood. 

I mostly stop in for coffee or a latte, but have enjoyed a variety of their breakfast noms too. The scones are probably my favorite - they bake them fresh and they have a great texture. The breakfast burrito is also tasty if you like a LOT of meat. 

As good as the food and coffee bevs are, however, the people are probably the best thing about Bacon Bacon. The people who work there are great and other customers always seem to be enjoying themselves.

excerpts: The breakfast burrito was fairly small, but it was so full of flavor that I looked past the size.
the breakfast burrito.author: Jeremy H.
the breakfast burrito.review: If you want an awesome meal any time of day, go to Bacon Bacon. My wife and I went here twice while we were in San Francisco and everything we tried was delicious! The breakfast burrito was fairly small, but it was so full of flavor that I looked past the size.

excerpts: The breakfast burrito with Chicharrónes I saw 1 table over will definitely be my pick next time though.
The walkup ordering was super easy and the staff was more than helpful with questions about menu items.
If you're looking for a soft drink, your options are limited, but let's be honest you're not coming to a place named Bacon Bacon for the sodie pop.
If you're cool with aqua like me, there is a water cooler with cups in the back, so no need to buy a bottle.
There are also a variety of teas and coffee beverages if you so choose.
I ordered the Bacon Bacon Double Cheeseburger with fries and it came to about $16.
In a quick 8-10 minutes, it was ready.
Seating is fairly limited so it was a perfect timeframe to wait for a table.
Get a pic riding the pig while you wait!
The burger is prepared to complete perfection - two .5

" patties ensconced in a sharp melty yellow cheddar and sauce sitting atop thick cut meaty greasy delicious bacon and sautéed onions all on a soft fluffy brioche roll (the perfect vehicle for all of that deliciousness).
The bacon made me believe in bacon again.
I didn't consider myself a fan of bacon before coming here, but I have since realized, I just wasn't a fan of the crappy thin, chewy, garbage that surely the pig making it would be ashamed of.
Bacon Bacon's bacon is what bacon should be - thick and juicy.
This was the best fast casual burger I've ever had - it blows Super Duper, Shake Shack, and Five Guys out of the water.
the breakfast burrito.author: Patrick K.
the breakfast burrito.review:
Sweet baby Jesus, thank you for giving us pigs. 

I came to Bacon Bacon on a Sunday afternoon, having been jonesing for a good burger all week. After a quick search of the web and Yelp - Bacon Bacon seemed to be the best option in the area. Boy, I was not disappointed! 
The menu offered many options for breakfast that looked and smelled delicious on my fellow diners plates, but I had burger on the mind. The breakfast burrito with Chicharrónes I saw 1 table over will definitely be my pick next time though. 
The walkup ordering was super easy and the staff was more than helpful with questions about menu items. If you're looking for a soft drink, your options are limited, but let's be honest you're not coming to a place named Bacon Bacon for the sodie pop. If you're cool with aqua like me, there is a water cooler with cups in the back, so no need to buy a bottle. There are also a variety of teas and coffee beverages if you so choose.
I ordered the Bacon Bacon Double Cheeseburger with fries and it came to about $16. In a quick 8-10 minutes, it was ready. Seating is fairly limited so it was a perfect timeframe to wait for a table. Get a pic riding the pig while you wait!
The burger is prepared to complete perfection - two .5" patties ensconced in a sharp melty yellow cheddar and sauce sitting atop thick cut meaty greasy delicious bacon and sautéed onions all on a soft fluffy brioche roll (the perfect vehicle for all of that deliciousness). The bacon made me believe in bacon again. I didn't consider myself a fan of bacon before coming here, but I have since realized, I just wasn't a fan of the crappy thin, chewy, garbage that surely the pig making it would be ashamed of. Bacon Bacon's bacon is what bacon should be - thick and juicy. This was the best fast casual burger I've ever had - it blows Super Duper, Shake Shack, and Five Guys out of the water.
The fries, in my opinion, were fantastic. They were a basic, thicker cut (not steak fry), with shaved parmesan on top - no salt.

I will most certainly be returning to try other menu items. You get AMAZING food, a huge portion, and friendly service. What more do you need? Maybe a stroller, because when you leave you'll have twin food babies.

excerpts: Got the breakfast burrito here.
The burrito was mediocre.
Comes with a small sliver of avocado and soggy eggs.
We ended up waiting 30 minutes to get our food.
the breakfast burrito.author: Matthew F.
the breakfast burrito.review: Got the breakfast burrito here. The burrito was mediocre. Comes with a small sliver of avocado and soggy eggs. We ended up waiting 30 minutes to get our food.

excerpts: The breakfast burrito is AMAZING.
Make sure you try some of the hot sauce on it!
the breakfast burrito.author: TJ L.
the breakfast burrito.review: The breakfast burrito is AMAZING. Make sure you try some of the hot sauce on it!

excerpts: The breakfast burrito was so amazing!
Avocado, pork, bacon, pepper, eggs.
Great flavor!
the breakfast burrito.author: BB S.
the breakfast burrito.review: bacon    The breakfast burrito was so amazing!  Avocado, pork, bacon, pepper, eggs.  Great flavor!

excerpts: I got the breakfast burrito because it was recommended on yelp.
It was delicious.
I wasn't the only one that thought the place tasted pretty good.
I had a classmate with me and he thought the same.
I also tried the bacon hot chocolate.
It reminded me of a mexican hot chocolate.
I also highly recommend the breakfast burrito.
the breakfast burrito.author: John P.
the breakfast burrito.review:
So many times SF has let me down.  The restaurants seem to be getting more snooty by the minute.  And the self important Tech upperclass is bringing the diversity of the city down day by day.  So i was skeptical walking into Bacon Bacon.  I didn't want to try their truck because their restaurant has more stars.  I couldn't have been more pleased with my decision.

I got the breakfast burrito because it was recommended on yelp.  It was delicious.  I wasn't the only one that thought the place tasted pretty good.  I had a classmate with me and he thought the same.  I also tried the bacon hot chocolate.  It reminded me of a mexican hot chocolate.  I could feel the tiny fat globules in every sip adding that savory flavor.

I would highly recommend Bacon Bacon.  Come for the laid back atmosphere and the tasty food.  I also highly recommend the breakfast burrito.

excerpts: Ordered the breakfast burrito to go.
Oh man is this good!
it's pulled pork, eggs, cheddar cheese, guacamole, a green pepper, and BACON!
